description: Hibs face Raith in Viaplay Cup last 16
title: Hibs face Raith in Viaplay Cup last 16
title_page: Hibs face Raith in Viaplay Cup last 16 - BBC Sport
maintext:
Hibernian will face Raith Rovers in the last 16 of the Viaplay Cup.
The Leith side, who bypassed the group stage due to their European commitments, will have home advantage for the encounter against the second-tier club.
The tie is due to be played on the weekend of 19/20 August.
